channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024101349
item.description:
Report X-2024101349

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-23T09:14:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-20
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A UNDECLARED PACKAGE WITH NO DOT LABEL WAS FOUND OPEN DUE TO THE PLASTIC PACKING TAPE FAILING. 36X16.72 FLUID OZ REGULATED METAL AEROSOL BOTTLES OF LOCTITE MR 5426 MAXIMUM STRENGTH HEADLINER ADHESIVE NO RELEASE. PACKAGE CONTAINS REGULATED ITEMS BUT NO DOT LABELS WERE PLACED ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE PACKAGE MAKES THIS PACKAGE UNDECLARED.

item.title: Report X-2024101245
item.description:
Report X-2024101245

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-23T09:14:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-17
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A PACKAGE WITH NO DOT LABEL WAS FOUND WET DUE TO INTERAL LEAKAGE. 1X10 FLUID OZ REGULATED METAL AEROSOL BOTTLE OF BLOW OFF DUSTER 10OZ NO RELEASE. THERE IS NO DOT LABELS ON THE PACKAGE MAKING IT UNDECLARED. 1X1 FLUID QUART NON REGULATED NYCO CLEAR VIEW GLASS AND MIRROR CLEANER COVER SEAL FAILED, COVER BECAME LOOSE AND THE CONTENT LEAKED OUT.

item.title: Report X-2024100914
item.description:
Report X-2024100914

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-21T12:23:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-10
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg missing required Hazmat certification, OP-900LL tear-away Hazmat tags and proper markings for a pkg containing flammable liquids/solids. Too much weight caused the corner and bottom of the carton to rip exposing the contents and allowing contents to fall out of the carton. 1 x 16 oz. plastic bottle fell out cracking the bottom corner of the bottle which allowed liquid to leak - no visible damage to contents. Pkg contains an assortment of surgical/medical supplies consisting of Germicidal Wipes with a Flash Point below 74 F, Isopropyl Rubbing Alcohol (Flash Point above 150 F), tape, printer labels, gauze/sponges etc.
